title: Marriage for moderns: In time of trouble
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Marriage
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Interpersonal conflict
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Interpersonal communication
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal conflict
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal communication
description: Dramatizes the experiences of a couple whose happy marriage is jeopardized by a selfish lack of understanding of the partnership aspects of married life. When Mrs Denkman comes for counsel to Dr Burns, the clergyman who married her, she takes a wise step. Dr Burns is able to advise her on remedial measures for her marriage, which is declining because of problems revealed in her husband's heavy drinking.
